column4: i guess i'll open a bug...ugh
oh
You mean i can play SC4K on limux amd64? :-)
sim city 4
cool!
Is that gentoo running a 32bit kernel or 64bit?
Yeah, cedega seems to run fine without a chroot here too.
all i had to do was install a 32bit libpng and add /usr/lib32 to LD_LIBRARY_PATH for cedega to run without a chroot
hehe, gentoo is actually fairly decent on amd64. 5 minutes for a kernel compile and ~25 for xorg is acceptable i think
they kept breaking gcc though, trying to add multilib support
That's 25 minutes each time him over there *point at daniels* decides to release a new X.
you're allowed to use your computer while it compiles
Slows down my apps, though.
you'd be surprised what nice can do
Turn 25 mins into 2 hours? ;-)
no, i never even needed nice
athon64's are plenty fast unless you want to play a GL game while you're compiling...i wouldn't recommend that. doing anything else though, and you won't even noticed
At that point it's still a waste of electricity, though.
join the omish if you care that much
Go burn a forest if you care that little <heh> ;-)
